values:
Hey everybody,

Sorry i havnt updated this thing in awhile, theres really nothing to right about these dayz since schools been out. But o well, 2 1/2 more months til where back to papar and pencils. Brittany, ur DEAD, but i still love ya, well i have to, ur family..lol.

CONGRATS to craig and nena, Hope u guyz are happy.

CONGRATS to kayla and josh, I told u things would get better.

Anyways, i hope everybody has a good summer, and nobody get hurt, i wanna see u this comming school year! ( mostly on 4-wheelers) (shhhh) (lol)

~luvs me always~

Heather Lynn

Hey, push comes to shove, today sucked ass. If anybody reads my stupid thoughts on the internet. Maybe u actually wonder what goes on with me, maybe u care, hell maybe u dont. It doesnt matter. A person made me relize what a bad person i am. FUCK! It was already a bad day and sumone happens to be on the computer giving me hell and laughing at me because of sumthing that really hurt me. He thought it was funny to see me  hurt. O well alot of people seem to think that way. Went to see Bobby today. He looked awful! rachel and i couldnt stay in there long it was hard to look at him. He broke both legs, and his left leg might not be able to work right agian, he broke his right arm and hand, and he broke his pelvic bone. He is put on a breathing machine. He was to go threw surgery every 3 days to try to get all the broken bones fixed. We had to wait for about 3 hours just to see him. well i better go. ill right to u guyz later!
~_*#HeAtHeR#*_~

Hey every. Today was a VERY wierd day. I got my first tattoo today. The guy that did my tattoo was so nice. And we dont wanna forget what happened today about 6:00pm. Bobby Bowman and Lindsey Mann was in a car wreck. Bobby is in bad shape and as everybody knows Lindsey did not make it. My thoughts go out to the family and friends that care o so much. If anybody needs to talk im here for ya. If im not on here just call me. Welp i better go and if i here anything about how Bobby is doing ill update.

~Heather Lynn~    1(304)965-1215
